job_description:
Employer Industry: Medical Devices

Why Consider this Job Opportunity:
- Competitive salary up to $210,100 plus bonus eligibility
- Opportunity to lead end-to-end data engineering projects and drive tactical execution
- Remote or hybrid work flexibility options
- Support and manage various data platforms and data models
- Contribute to evaluating financial impacts for existing projects and new opportunities
- Investigate and implement new data engineering infrastructure

What to Expect (Job Responsibilities):
- Lead end-to-end data engineering projects from requirement definition to architecture validation and deployment
- Develop the data infrastructure for procuring, transforming, and structuring data from multiple systems
- Support/manage the implementation, organization, and administration of various data platforms
- Support/manage data model refresh schedules and maintain optimal system performance
- Provide insights and recommendations on data architecture and movement

What is Required (Qualifications):
- Bachelor's degree OR 6+ years of applicable data engineering & architecture work experience
- 4+ years of work experience in data engineering projects
- Experience in object-oriented programming and data structures
- Skills in at least one programming language central to Data Engineering (e.g. SQL, Python)
- Experience in ETL/ELT, pipeline creation, orchestration, & data store/warehouse/systems architecture
- Experience in cloud-based native tools such as Power BI, Apache Spark, Azure, GCP, AWS
- Experience utilizing business intelligence platforms (e.g. Power BI)
- Familiarity with programming languages central to data analytics (e.g. SQL, Python, R, DAX, M)

How to Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications):
- Masters degree
- Familiarity with DataOps, DevOps, and/or SecOps
- Proficiency in data security & data privacy best practices
- Proficiency in utilizing Agile/DevOps for versioning control
- Experience with project management tools & framework

#MedicalDevices #DataEngineering #RemoteWork #CompetitiveSalary #CareerOpportunity

At Talentify, we prioritize candidate privacy and champion equal-opportunity employment. Central to our mission is our partnership with companies that share this commitment. We aim to foster a fair, transparent, and secure hiring environment for all. If you encounter any employer not adhering to these principles, please bring it to our attention immediately.
Talentify is not the EOR (Employer of Record) for this position. Our role in this specific opportunity is to connect outstanding candidates with a top-tier employer.

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree OR 6+ years of applicable data engineering & architecture work experience
4+ years of work experience in data engineering projects
Experience in object-oriented programming and data structures
Skills in at least one programming language central to Data Engineering (e.g. SQL, Python)
Experience in ETL/ELT, pipeline creation, orchestration, & data store/warehouse/systems architecture
Experience in cloud-based native tools such as Power BI, Apache Spark, Azure, GCP, AWS
Experience utilizing business intelligence platforms (e.g. Power BI)
Familiarity with programming languages central to data analytics (e.g. SQL, Python, R, DAX, M)
Responsibilities: Support and manage various data platforms and data models
Contribute to evaluating financial impacts for existing projects and new opportunities
Investigate and implement new data engineering infrastructure
Lead end-to-end data engineering projects from requirement definition to architecture validation and deployment
Develop the data infrastructure for procuring, transforming, and structuring data from multiple systems
Support/manage the implementation, organization, and administration of various data platforms
Support/manage data model refresh schedules and maintain optimal system performance
Provide insights and recommendations on data architecture and movement
Benefits: Competitive salary up to $210,100 plus bonus eligibility
Opportunity to lead end-to-end data engineering projects and drive tactical execution
Remote or hybrid work flexibility options
